definition: dried meat/private teacher's remuneration/withered/variant of 修[xiu1]
to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)

sentences.english: The schoolgirl developed long legs, her jawline changed, she had her hair cut.
sentences.chinese: 她双腿变得修长，下巴轮廓变了，头发也剪短了。

sentences.english: Long-stemmed models ankled though the lobby.
sentences.chinese: 身材修长的模特儿袅袅婷婷地走过大厅。

sentences.english: A protruding collarbone and a long, elegant neck were also the focus of secondary erogenous zones in China.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，突出的锁骨和修长优雅的颈项也是性感区域。

sentences.english: Showing the arm a little bit is going to make you look taller and leaner.
sentences.chinese: 露点胳膊出来将使你看起来苗条修长。

sentences.english: Don't focus a lot on intense strength training if slim and trim is your goal.
sentences.chinese: 如果纤瘦修长是你的目标，就不要做太多的体力训练。

sentences.english: Emphasis was thus placed on a slim, refined design.
sentences.chinese: 强度感也因此被置入到了这样一个精巧修长的设计中。

sentences.english: She has long, slender legs and wears very short shorts.
sentences.chinese: 她很高，修长的腿上穿着超短裤。

sentences.english: The elegant and trendy long silhouette adds a fashionable touch to any outfit.
sentences.chinese: 加上优雅时尚的修长设计，可为装扮增添型格点缀。

sentences.english: The word of string course V tiny low waist designs to raise high feeling.
sentences.chinese: 腰线V字微低腰设计，以增加修长感。

sentences.english: The slender cowpea is a miniature of the unforgettable childhood.
sentences.chinese: 修长的豇豆，是难忘童年的缩影。

sentences.english: Match black taper edition jeans, the whole individual seems to be highly lofty.
sentences.chinese: 搭配着黑色窄版长裤，整个人显得极为修长。

sentences.english: But they share the same slim build, as well as a vague facial resemblance.
sentences.chinese: 不过，他们共有修长的身材，面部也隐约相似。

sentences.english: Long-stemmed models ankled through the lobby.
sentences.chinese: 身材修长的模特袅袅婷婷地从厅中走过。

sentences.english: My mother is not tall, christian louboutin shoes online, not short but slim.
sentences.chinese: 我的妈妈不高，不低但很修长。

sentences.english: In stature she was tall, somewhat slender, and in her latter days, even emaciated.
sentences.chinese: 她身材修长，有点娇弱，临死前，竟是形销骨立。

definition: line (in drawing, calligraphy etc)/the lines or contours of a three-dimensional object (hairstyle, clothing, car etc)
mellow and full/suave/smooth and round/rich (in voice)
